text: Arrā wa, yogen-sha to kunan no toki ni kare ni shitagatta sen'i-sha-tachi 〔muhājirūn〕 to enjo-sha-tachi 〔ansāru〕 ni awaremi o kake rareta. Sonogo kare-ra no ichibu no mono no kokoro wa,(sono gimu no rikō kara) hotondo sorete shimatta. Sonotoki kare hakare-ra ni, awaremi o kake rareta. Hontōni kare wa, kare-ra (musurimu) ni shinsetsudeari jihibukaku ara reru
